S7_a_type.description: The interface parameter is the message number input of message class x or the archive number input

S7_active.description: Identifies the declaration of a parameter

S7_alarm_ui.description: Message server ID. 0 = default, 1 = PCS 7 message dialog

S7_archive.description: Process values that are archived at runtime

S7_asset.description: Identifies a block/chart as an asset proxy

S7_blockview.description: Format or view of a block in CFC

S7_contact.description: Parameter belongs to a connection group

S7_driver.description: ID for the signal preprocessing driver block

S7_edit.description: Include the parameter in the Edit parameters/signals table for editing in Manager without opening the CFC chart

S7_event.description: Indicates parameters to be transferred from the AS to the OS change-driven

S7_dynamic.description: A parameter assigned this system attribute is automatically registered for testing in CFC test mode

S7_hardware.description: ID of a module-specific driver block

S7_language.description: Language and time stamp for the Manage Multilingual Texts function

S7_link.description: Defines whether the parameter can be interconnected in the CFC

S7_linklist.description: Can be used to assign other blocks to an S7-GRAPH block

S7_m_c.description: Defines whether the operator can control and monitor the parameter at an OS

S7_param.description: Defines whether the parameter can be programmed in the CFC

S7_pdiag.description: Block with diagnostic capability for process error diagnostic

S7_pdiag_motion.description: UDT for the S7-PDIAG language compiler

S7_pdiag_s_unit.description: UDT for the S7-PDIAG language compiler

S7_pdiag_unit.description: UDT for the S7-PDIAG language compiler

S7_rawdata.description: Block instance also includes a raw data variable in WinCC

S7_read_back.description: Allocate to the "Chart > Readback" function in the CFC

S7_sampletime.description: A parameter with this system attribute is automatically assigned the cycle time of the calling watchdog interrupt OB

S7_server.description: Identifies a parameter assigned to the message server

S7_server_1.description: Parameter is assigned to the connection server

S7_shortcut.description: Contains the parameter name with a maximum string length of 16 characters

S7_skipconn.description: Prevents code from being generated for the interconection of the block being handled

S7_state_rep.description: Identifies blocks for automatic alarm hiding in WinCC

S7_tag.description: If this system attribute has the value "false", the block is not entered inthe tag list of the OS

S7_tasklist.description: Contains a list of OBs in which the CFC has to install the block

S7_techparam.description: Block is used to assign parameters to technological functions

S7_trend.description: Sets the assignment to the block inputs used as limit values

S7_ts.description: Parameter has a time stamp for transfer to control system

S7_unit.description: Contains the name of the parameter"s physical unit

S7_visible.description: Make parameters in CFC visible or invisible

S7_qc.description: This attribute identifies parameters which provide the quality code in addition to the process value
